name: NATIVE EXTRACTS Lemon Aspen Cellular Extract
description: Cellular Extracts are created using purified, deionised rain-harvested water and less plant material to produce a True to Nature extract. With attention to eco-sustainable practices, traceable to source and transparent in composition ingredients – Cellular Extracts deliver the brilliance of nature. The NE Lemon Aspen Cellular Extract, also know as ‘Rainforest Lemon’ delivers the natural molecules this botanical species can offer in a water-soluble format, including Amino acids, lignan, phenolic acid, flavonoid glycosides and flavonoid-C-glycosides. The synergism of these powerful compounds delivers exciting new possibilities for natural solutions to premature aging, age lines, whitening/brightening, inflammation and antioxidant applications in skincare. This liquid cellular extract is forging a place as a potent new ingredient for superfoods and health promoting nutraceuticals.
